name: Titanic's Keys to the Past
description:
April 15th, 1912—the day on which the R.M.S. Titanic struck an iceberg during her maiden voyage across the North Atlantic Ocean. More than 1,500 passengers perished aboard the ship, one of whom was Lilian’s great-grandmother.

Today, Lilian is on her way to the grand opening of the world's first ocean-floor museum, a re-creation of the ill-fated Titanic. Once she arrives, something unbelievable happens: Lilian finds she can now travel into the past and visit the real Titanic! She must try to save the lives of some of the individuals who were trapped on the lower decks when catastrophe struck. Help her find the keys to unlock the gates and set these passengers free before the ship sinks!

Features:
An exciting ocean adventure
Challenging puzzles
32 adventure locations
Epic soundtrack and atmospheric ambient sounds
Fascinating Titanic facts from National Geographic
